title: Where did they go?
body:
To Riot (See I didn't call you Rito)

Hello I was looking in the store and noticed that the Vandal Gragas {{champion:79}} was no where to be seen. (It's the Gragas skin I wanted to buy.) And then i noticed that all the other Vandal Skins were also not in the store. Brand{{champion:63}}, Twitch{{champion:29}}, Jax{{champion:24}} and Vladimir{{champion:8}}. Even though I don't want the other ones (Well maybe brand) I would like to know. I look at the champion list through the profile and they are there with the Word that everyone hates "Unavailable". So I was just wondering now if they are legacy skins now or is there a bug in the system. I really wanted that Gragas Skin. It would be appreciated if I could get some answers.
{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}{{item:3110}}
Thanks
Aydozzz

replies.body: Those skins literally just became Legacy like a month ago. There was a whole big deal about it, they were on on sale for like a week...
You have a 0.0001% chance of getting it in a mystery gift! Try your luck bro, otherwise just wait a couple months, they'll bring back some legacy skins for a little time.

(Legacy Skin, No Longer Available)

Hop on LoLWiki to check details. It's under Skins/Trivia section of each champ.
